articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Apple unveils watchOS 26 with new design, wrist-flick gesture, and AI Workout Buddy feature - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple unveiled watchOS 26 with new design, wrist-flick gesture, and AI Workout Buddy feature during WWDC 2025.
articles.content: At Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC 25) on Monday, the tech giant unveiled watchOS 26, the upcoming software overhaul for the Apple Watch. watchOS 26 will launch with a redesigned interf… [+1491 chars]
